price: 30. (Mpe kanisa) tango eye bapengwi basalelaki yo(1) likita été bakanga yo to koboma yo, to babengana yo. Basalaki likita yango, Allah mpe asaleli bango, kasi Allah azali Nkolo likita ya malamu koleka.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
footnotes: 1 Muhammad (kimia mpe losambo ya Allah ezala likolo naye).

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhīna kafarū liyuth'bitūka aw yaqtulūka aw yukh'rijūka wayamkurūna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
